arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim makes Bruno Fernandes penalty decision ahead of Man United's clash with bitter rivals Liverpool amid star's woes from the spot this season
arts.sum: Fernandes failed from the spot against Brentford and Fulham , having previously only missed four of his 42 penalties since joining United in 2020.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Man United: Premier League Preview, Matchday 8, 2025
arts.sum: A player who has already proven to be pivotal to the success of the Reds might have gained even greater importance if the team are going to defend the Premier League title for the first time. The Red Devils hoped to banish the demons of the 2024/25 campaign for good with Â£200 million of spending in the summer to retool an attack that produced the fifth lowest goal tally in the Premier League .
